EPIC.name: Wushu Master's Guandao Blade
effects: 50% Chance Basic Attack deal 50% of damage to all opponents;
30% Chance Damage boost after tag-in for 15sec. Every following damage boost gained from this Equipment is 15% more powerful. Max 75% damage boost;
600% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
[KUNG LAO] Whenever an opponent uses a Special Attack gain 20% Critical Hit chance boost till the end of the match. Can stack up to 5 times.

[KUNG LAO][SET] If this is equipped alongside **Wushu Master's True Weapon**, any DIAMOND Kung Lao gains a 40% chance to perform a Special Combo Ender dealing massive damage. If the last opponent is under 25% health, a Brutality is performed instead of the Special Combo Ender, ending the fight immediately.

Successfully performed Special Attack 2 applies Silence debuff for 15sec to the whole opponent team. Silence prevents the affected Characters from using Special Attack 1 and reduces their Power generation by 60%. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

EPIC.name: The Torturer
effects: Debuffs applied to an opponent are 30% more powerful. This applies to **Bleed**, **Fire**, **Poison**, **Blind**, **Weaken**, **Curse**, **Shield Break**, **Vampire**, **Power Drain**, and **Power Steal**.
50% Chance to apply **Fire**, **Bleed** or **Poison** on Combo Ender;
600% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
50% Chance to reflect any debuff back to an opponent. Team debuffs are not affected. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

EPIC.name: Famous Fashion Dominator
effects: 55% Max health boost;
70% Chance to apply **Blind** to an opponent for using a Special Attack against the user;
1200% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***

[JOHNNY CAGE][SET] If this is equipped alongside **Famous Dashing Smile**, any DIAMOND Johnny Cage gains a 40% chance to perform a Special Combo Ender dealing massive damage. If the last opponent is under 25% health, a Brutality is performed instead of the Special Combo Ender, ending the fight immediately.
[JOHNNY CAGE] 10% Power generation boost after performing a successful Special Attack. Stacks up to 5 times;

Gain Energy Shield when below 80% Health. Energy Shield reduces all incoming damage when user loses Health. The more Health is lost, the higher is Energy Shield damage reduction. Maximum reduction - 50% at 20% Health and below. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

EPIC.name: Jinsei Hat
effects: 50% Critical Hit chance boost;
20% Chance to apply **Weaken**, **Shield Break** or **Curse** on a Critical Hit;
225% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
450% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***

Once per match, avoid death by automatically tagging out before the killing blow. After tag-out user gains 1000% Recovery for 7sec. This effect does not trigger if the killing blow is Brutality. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

RARE.name: Famous Dashing Smile
effects: 150% Combo Ender damage boost.
40% Chance to apply **Incurability** debuff to the whole opponent team for 10sec on Special Attack 1;
300% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***

[JOHNNY CAGE][SET] If this is equipped alongside **Famous Fashion Dominator**, any DIAMOND Johnny Cage gains a 40% chance to perform a Special Combo Ender dealing massive damage. If the last opponent is under 25% health, a Brutality is performed instead of the Special Combo Ender, ending the fight immediately.
Gain 30% more Power from hitting an opponent. The opponent doesn't get Power from those hits. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

RARE.name: Body of Steel
effects: 30% Opponent unblockable attack chance reduction;
30% Resistance to all debuffs;
600% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
20% of incoming Basic Attack damage transforms to Health and 50% transforms to Power. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

RARE.name: Wushu Master's True Weapon
effects: 60% Basic Attack damage boost.
60% Chance to transfer 50% damage to Health on Special Attack 2;
150% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
300% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***

[KUNG LAO][SET] If this is equipped alongside **Wushu Master's Guandao Blade**, any DIAMOND Kung Lao gains a 40% chance to perform a Special Combo Ender dealing massive damage. If the last opponent is under 25% health, a Brutality is performed instead of the Special Combo Ender, ending the fight immediately.
Health is increased and restored by 10% after performing any Special Attack. Max 5 times in the battle. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

UNCOMMON.name: Peaceful Mind
effects: 40% Opponent Critical Hit Chance reduction;
80% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
160% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
15% Reduced Power cost on all Special Attacks. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

UNCOMMON.name: Jiaozi
effects: 40% Critical Hit damage boost;
80% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
160% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
10% Chance to remove all active DOTs from the user when dealing a Critical Hit. DOTs from Fight Modifiers are not affected. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)

UNCOMMON.name: Cyberpack 2007
effects: 30% Special Attack 1 and Special Attack 2 Critical Hit chance boost;
80% Damage boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
160% Max Health boost. ***Earthrealm Tower only.***
0.5 Bar of starting Power. (*Unlocks at fusion level X*)
